level.heading: Deposition, production, and inspection.
level.text: The rules of the Superior Court applicable to compliance with subpoenas to attend and give testimony, produce designated books, documents, records, electronically stored information, or tangible things, or permit inspection of premises apply to subpoenas issued under ยง 13-443.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 18-147, see notes following ยง 13-441.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 5 of the Uniform Interstate Depositions and Discovery Act. See Vol. 13, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
